io.atomix.primitive.proxy

Interface PrimitiveProxyExecutor

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    PrimitiveProxy, RaftProxy
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    io.atomix.primitive.proxy.impl.AbstractPrimitiveProxy, PrimaryBackupProxy

    public interface PrimitiveProxyExecutor
    Raft proxy executor.

        Registers a session state change listener.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
